name: De Conditione Mortalis: BLOODBATH/metanoia
description:
A short, creepy, immersive and primordial experience that will bring you underground, in a completely unknown place, full of puzzles to solve, hunted by a ruthless being.

You'll find a lot of metaphoric  elements, meaningful details and different, philosophical and psichological interpretations.

Pixeled assets and minimal graphics were used here, precise and curated.

The game is based on original, interesting, complex puzzles, if you can't solve them, here's a walkthrough I recorded for you, so that you can go on without getting bored!

Feel free to report any bug in the comments below.

I worked hard and really tried to transmit a message, ENJOY!
